title: STOP VIRUS KORONA
allTitles: {"en":"Virus Korona sigino lukdik","es":"Sobre el Coronavirus","wms":"STOP VIRUS KORONA"}
credits: Created by Weiman Kow, instagram: weimankow
summary: This book gives basic advice on dealing with the coronavirus COVID 19

12.wms: VIRUS KORONAne andagamondik komegegen eptage sanggomo katkenaktak

21.wms: Wambemo kamgenakna. Kamge 2 metetkenaknandik, walokge demale gogopwe domandage matetkenamat.

25.wms: Golo kapwe apyokgup, hiwagilokgup, yayunggupka hetkonamale nemanunantak:

27.wms: Egeptaga masketle nandakna. Emanunano egepwe hiwagilokdik goyo apyokdik ewe masket topka si halono sinimo manggopwe lawontakdoe.

31.wms: Nombono kapwe epmo yayune bumdik, do ego andit wambemomopsigi masket halogen.

32.wms: Viruskola lawatbono kapwe tepwe lapbesanmono katkenagetoendik, ego yayune kamo komegemoge.

33.wms: Langkap dagit talokge awopdik yayunggup dimopwe gogopwe amokgolo, matetbaline kap dagit talokge kanaget.

47.wms: Emandik, yayuno kapko walokge nombombo talokga ambomoge…

49.wms: koyo gup sinimo manggopko kelopkalit lawatkegele,

51.wms: Manggopdoeka imakeman ewe baunbelo dako ga kelopkalitle lawat,

52.wms: Matetbaline ewo imakeman ambatle sabungga goyo baikilin okga ogopnundik goyo, alkohol okga geleman talokge hopkotnundik viruse tembetkemat.

53.wms: Viruse imakeman ambat talokga bageno satkelopwe 24kupke motomgemoge.

56.wms: Ewoptagolo, nombono lukge hetago lapkitmane matet kayan.

61.wms: Kelat topwo na walip kolamo nege.”

63.wms: Nombono bemsekge lio nanggatka ga bisitle ogoknu!

64.wms: Tutnum topwo kuwup-kowaop nege, Kelat topwo kuwup-kowaop nege.

69.wms: Ga bisitle andagambetik ogokmono bokge tembetkemat?

72.wms: Masket mote besan talokge ga bisitka lawoget.

74.wms: Masketle ugumgegeno motomgetkegele viruse ephalo bage komegemat.

82.wms: Bisit munggupkane ga kelopkalitle lawogetoe, golo ka emanuna.

83.wms: Lapkitmomatkegele, aptopwe bisit munggupka goyo manlingga bakbet katombetnu.

87.wms: Ga bisitle alipkup satkup sabungga ogopnu.

91.wms: Kitanggutlo lukge tulepon halongga hetago katkenak.

92.wms: "This animation shows how far your sneeze can actually travel" by Chia Yi Hou and Andrea Schmitz, in Bussiness Insider (Jan 21, 2020)

93.wms: "The Wuhan Virus: How to stay safe", by Laurie Garrett, in Foreign Policy, Report. (Jan 25, 2020)

94.wms: "How to Avoid the Corona Virus? Wash your hands", by Elizabeth Rosenthal, in the New York Times, Opinion. (Jan 28, 2020)

95.wms: Virus Korona singino luk ewe nombono buku-buku talokga detbo:

96.wms: 3. FB talokga dagatmomopkegele, nombono hitkup oknu: @weimankowart (IG), koyo link nombone hanot: instagram.com/weimankow

109.en: Ne oplawo okmalembono lukge laphamoget, do luk kitanggutka hetago katkemomopsigi oplawo oknuntak, epkup komik nombone taget lawomopsigindik dagatmoget.  Luk kitanggutka oplawo ugumomalo topwe nombono lukgup bagetkup okmatbono kap Weiman Kow ego hitle oknuntak.
